title: Horizon Zero Dawn Remake: Is Sony Going Too Far? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.03.22
description:
Horizon Zero Dawn could get a remake? And a multiplayer game?? Greg and Bless talk about that, big PSVR 2 ambitions, Fandom acquiring Gamespot and Giant Bomb, and some industry drama.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping

It’s FINALLY happening: Friday the 14th, we’re moving into The Spare Bedroom!

The Roper Report  -

00:10:03 - Horizon Zero Dawn PS5 Remaster Reportedly In the Works Alongside a Multiplayer Game
00:30:23 - Sony Is Reportedly Making 2 Million PSVR 2 Units for Launch
00:39:20 - Ad
00:41:31 - Dead Space is getting a gameplay reveal tomorrow
00:43:54 - Fandom acquires GameSpot, Metacritic, Giant Bomb, and other sites
00:52:32 - Halo’s developer is reportedly switching to Unreal Engine
00:56:46 - Activision Blizzard Chief Compliance Officer Frances Townsend Has Stepped Down
00:58:43 - Key Disco Elysium Developers Have 'Involuntarily' Left the Company
01:01:36 - ‘Fallout’ is celebrating its 25th anniversary
01:01:49 - Out today
01:02:19 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Bless
